channel.title: nix on Organizing Chaos
channel.description: Recent content in nix on Organizing Chaos

item.title: A Rust + WASM development environment with Nix
item.description: Getting started with a new ecosystem can be difficult. Using Nix makes the solution reproducible! I was recently following the setup guide for Rust and WebAssembly and found more surprises than I was expecting while setting up the development environment using a Nix Flake. As I’ve also been working towards a personal repository of Flake templates, I thought it might help others to detail the issues that I encountered and how I solved them.
